=== Toshiba Satellite A300 ===

** Contact: SlashNetwork

** Make: Toshiba

** Brand: Satellite

** Model: A300

** Website: http://fr.computers.toshiba-europe.com/innovation/product/Satellite-A300-1FG/1056115/

=== Current Issues ===

** Some Fn keys don't work especially Fn+F6 adn Fn+F7.
** When we hibernate the PC, it reboot instantaneously.
** Fan doesnt spin up. Some reports suggest it does at high temperatures.
